####################
Package dependencies
####################

**Melusine** works with Python >= 3.5. It builds on top of following packages:

- ``pandas>=0.25.0``
- ``scikit-learn>=0.19.0``
- ``flashtext>=2.7``
- ``gensim>=3.3.0``
- ``nltk>=3.3``
- ``keras>=2.2.0``
- ``tqdm>=4.34``
- ``streamlit>=0.57.3``
- ``tensorflow>=2.0.0``
- ``transformers==2.11.0``
- ``joblib``
- ``plotly``
- ``unidecode``
